Identity.History: One of the only pre-empire celebrations left, the Carnival is a crazy gathering of rabid feasts, celebration, and all manner of silly displays. Many Labrynnians flock to these events before they finally are banned from the Empire.

Trainer.Entities: units/labrynna/{civ}_trader_b gaia/lon_lon_cow_1 units/merc_geru_b units/merc_tinsuit_b units/merc_wosu_b units/labrynna/{civ}_vire_b
